creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: grouping of trees with dense, dark foliage LRC; at center, a small hut with lightly tinted thatched roof and a figure in blue near side window; shadowy, tall mountain rises at R, with a shorter, more well defined cliff with trees and foliage at center R; inscription ULQ
inscription:
Inscription and Seals

ULQ, in Japanese
markings: center UL, gourd-shaped relief; UL edge, square intaglio; UL edge, square relief; LRC, square intaglio
medium: Ink and light colors on paper
title: Landscape
